<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE pricing-model SYSTEM "dynamosystemresource:/atg/dtds/pmdl/pmdl_1.0.dtd">
<pricing-model> <!--When Order's priceInfo's total is not less than 1000 Order Total --> <qualifier> <greater-than-or-equals> <value>order.priceInfo.total</value> <constant> <data-type>java.lang.Double</data-type> <string-value>1000.0</string-value> </constant> </greater-than-or-equals> </qualifier> </pricing-model>
